attributes.action: Brian Gittins - This Man Deserves Prominence
attributes.additional_details:
A wonderful man, he deserves a comedy show on tv.  Worth more in character and depth than many current performers on tv, Brian serves to encourage the subconscious, to appeal to and improve the moral nature of people.

In a world of benign opportunists being thrust to the fore via 'reality' shows, there exists a select few characters that have to power to influence people for the good.

Brian Gittins IS one of these people.

Please sign the petition and you'll see for yourself how this man can affect millions, in a very good way. Thank you.
